trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class defines the signing date and time of a signature.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> object can be used as an authenticated attribute of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> object when an authenticated date and time are to accompany a digital signature.
A signing time attribute is also available in CAPICOM.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> class has the following default property values.

If you want to specify a specific date and time for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> object, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29> constructor.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor(System.Byte[])"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class by using the specified array of byte values as the encoded signing date and time of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
An array of byte values that specifies the encoded signing date and time of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor(System.DateTime)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class by using the specified signing date and time.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> structure that represents the signing date and time of the signature.
This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from which to copy information.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime"></xref> property retrieves a <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> structure that represents the date and time that the message was signed.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> structure that contains the date and time the document was signed.
